item.title: iPadOS 26 preview: The rare software update that makes (most) old hardware feel new
item.description: Public beta arrives today; here’s what we’ve found in our weeks of testing.

item.title: Apple Intelligence news summaries are back, with a big red disclaimer
item.description: Apple disabled news summaries earlier this year after they mangled headlines.

item.title: Apple sues YouTuber who leaked iOS 26’s new “Liquid Glass” software redesign
item.description: YouTuber claims to “have receipts” disproving Apple’s allegations.
